title: Parse Build Configuration
description: Implement a parser that extracts key-value configuration from a simplified build.gradle.kts-style string. Extract group, version, and dependency declarations.
instructions: Create a BuildConfigParser that takes a multi-line config string and extracts: group name, version, and a list of dependency coordinates. Use string parsing only -- no Gradle APIs.

hints.text: Split the config by lines and look for lines containing '=' for assignments
Use Regex to extract quoted string values after '='

commonMistakes.mistake: Not trimming whitespace from extracted values
commonMistakes.correction: Always call trim() on extracted strings

commonMistakes.mistake: Using split(':') without limiting -- artifact coordinates contain colons
commonMistakes.correction: Maven coordinates always have exactly 3 parts: group:artifact:version
